ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:451)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:452)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:454)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:455)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:2018)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value/@code="77386006" Pregnant (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT), where its data type is CD (CONF:457)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:458, CONF:459, CONF:460), such that
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR (refers to)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Estimated Date Of Delivery Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:451)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:452)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:454)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:455)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:2018)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value/@code="77386006" Pregnant (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT), where its data type is CD (CONF:457)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:458, CONF:459, CONF:460), such that
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR (refers to)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Estimated Date Of Delivery Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.15.3.1)
